html:
10.12.21  11:28 am   would you describe your next song as energetic or chill?

      it's both. actually, most songs are both

10.12.21  11:24 am   is the word asleep in your song?

      yes

10.12.21  10:16 am   10.11.21  1:12 pm     Was the lyric  "now everything's pink" a reference to the color of the text on the anagrams page?

      no

10.12.21  9:53 am   is it possible for school to be fun

      yes

10.12.21  9:23 am   what do you think about the time 12:15 PM?

      it's pretty bright

10.12.21  5:35 am   Got any interesting ways to resolve chord progressions besides dominants and secondary dominants?

      think of the whole picture, including the lyrical context and everything else in and around the song. don't forget to think outside the box here. for example, sometimes the best way to 'resolve' 'chords' is with 'non-chords', and vice versa

10.12.21  3:55 am   are you in love with anything

      i'm in love with everything

10.12.21  2:46 am   never gonna give you up

      that's nice to hear

10.12.21  12:47 am   When I'm writing a story, I delete any part that I didn't enjoy writing. When you're writing songs, how do you decide which parts to delete?

      the parts i don't enjoy hearing

10.12.21  12:43 am   If you aren't going to publish an official Bill Wurtz album, could you suggest a few songs of yours and an order to listen to them in? That way there could be an official way to listen to lots of bill wurtz all at once

      shuffle

10.12.21  12:03 am   Your videos inspire me so much :)

What are the works you're most proud of

      i haven't done them yet

10.11.21  11:53 pm   i think I asked you a question while ago but I can find it. Can u help me?

      sure

10.11.21  11:14 pm   How are things going production-wise?

     good

     Are you getting better at producing content at a reasonable pace?

     yes

     Do you think you'll be able to get back to the two-week schedule in the future?

     yes

10.11.21  11:02 pm   what if earth was a cube? what would you do?

      visit the corners

10.11.21  9:53 pm   Can your music be used to pick up women?

      nowadays women can pick themselves up

10.11.21  8:36 pm   When I was younger, I used to have dreams that at the very end of space, there was a gigantic door, and when it opened all you could see was nothing because it was too bright but that space that was whatever came next. Do you think it could be real,

     no

      and, follow up question, am I the chosen one who has to go find it

     yes

10.11.21  7:56 pm   Will you ever made a demands page, like, just like this but every question is phrased like a demand.

      the whole rest of the internet is like that

10.11.21  6:47 pm   In the Mount St Helens Is About To Blow Up music video, you spelled "Grey" in its British spelling as opposed to the American spelling of "gray". What is the reason?

      the reason i had to choose 1 is because it would be distracting to use both at the same time. i did not know that one of them was british and one was usa, but i usually use 'grey' because it looks duller. 'gray' looks more vibrant, which usually goes against the meaning of the word

10.11.21  6:29 pm   how do you accomplish something of great magnitude when you are in shambles, lost in the pool of no moving on?

     there's too many ways to list here

     if so, do you think anybody in the world can accomplish this?

     yes

10.11.21  4:35 pm   do you think music is the key to all the secrets of the universe 

      no, just some of them

10.11.21  3:46 pm   do you think fear is a valid source of motivation?

      yes, but that's not the whole story

10.11.21  3:15 pm   have you learned anything from answering these questions

      each day i learn everything. then it changes.

10.11.21  3:08 pm   how many different combinations of songs are there not including remixes? 

      none. they changed the rules. now every song is considered a remix

10.11.21  1:58 pm   i have an idea for an artpiece and i have all the details planned out but my skills only allow me to make a very basic aproximation of it and it takes a lot of tideous work. what level of suffering am i on?

      earth

10.11.21  1:12 pm   Why were the anagram sources blue before they were pink?

      the color indicates whether it was a request or not. the pink ones were requested. the blue ones were my own choices

10.11.21  12:45 pm   is your green screen green?

      yes, but sometimes i wish it wasn't

10.11.21  11:35 am   I want to work on a video documentary but I don't know what I want to make it about. Any topic suggestions?

      that's easy, just do all the topics

10.11.21  10:20 am   is your next song's name "slept good thru every  night"?

      no

10.11.21  10:13 am   what do you like about earth?

      the wild shape it is

10.11.21  9:41 am   why is nothing working for me

      this will make it mean so much more when something finally does

10.11.21  9:36 am   does your work belong in a museum

      yes BUT, i've just been informed that the whole world is a museum

10.11.21  9:32 am   Thoughts on quantum physics?

      i have different thoughts about it, depending on who is asking

10.11.21  8:39 am   What is your thought process when making animations.

      how can i get this to be just as good (or better), without moving

10.11.21  5:07 am   what's for dinner?

      a whirlwind of mixed viewpoints

10.11.21  2:19 am   Is apple juice better than orange juice?

      find out each week, as they go head to head in a juice fight

10.11.21  1:42 am   If you could change one lyric from any of your songs, which one would you change?

      i would change them all, to "oh"

10.11.21  12:51 am   What is your thoughts on the letter h?

      i find it questionable

10.11.21  12:27 am   what is a question

      i'm not sure

10.11.21  12:21 am   Help, i'm developing feelings for a fictional character.

      pass it along: create more fictional characters for other people to feel for

10.10.21  11:46 pm   do you sing the word "sleep" in your next song?

      i was going to say yes, then i thought about it more and realized no, that's a similar word but not exactly 'sleep', then i realized another part of the song that actually does say 'sleep', then i realized i was wrong about that too, that one is not actually the word 'sleep' but another similar word. then i thought about it more and found a 3rd location in the song that does actually have the word 'sleep'. so the conclusion for those of you keeping score, the song does contain the word sleep

10.10.21  10:57 pm   how do you feel about fractals?

      they keep me grounded

10.10.21  10:24 pm   in the comments of i'm a princess there's a detailed explanation of what the song might mean. it included a few ways that the song ties into the story of Rapunzel. was this intentional?

      impossible, i've never heard of rapunzel

10.10.21  8:56 pm   why does my imagination come up with really cool ideas, but my skill walls me from doing the ideas

      this is to drive your skills to increase

10.10.21  8:03 pm   I'm about to start a big project I have been planning for quite some time but I'm scared that it could be not as good as I want, could you give me some words of encouragement?

      which are you more scared of: doing it, or not doing it?

10.10.21  7:57 pm   Ive done too much drawing and dont feel enthusiastic. What do I do?

      how about some writing

10.10.21  6:26 pm   do you ever fall victim of making something 'too good', by which i mean making something with so much potential that you have no idea how to make it live up to that potential in the final product and you struggle to even do the thing

     yes

     if so, do you have any tested methods to either one: avoid that point of too goodness
two: move the goalposts in such a way that you come to terms with the fact that what you're doing is great

      no

10.10.21  4:23 pm   Does every submission to this page that  you read make you stronger? Or do some make you weaker? 

      it's a circle. if i get too strong i become weak. then i can get strong again

10.10.21  11:16 am   How far away is the sky

      very close. it's right in front of you

10.10.21  11:12 am   any songs that you like where singers harmonize on the "oo" vowel for a long time?

      how about the first 4 bars of "i thought she knew" by nsync

10.10.21  6:59 am   what inspired you to make music

      it must have been music itself. still is
